thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 44 of 227
thread.title: Bret Postal
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Bret Postal

author: Bret Postal
title: Bret Postal
text: My wife and I only had a little time to do some shopping and didn't intend to buy. Our Salesperson was honest, informative and not pushy at all. We made a decision after finding what we liked and were out of there within an hour. We just had everything delivered to our house 16 hours later and everything is great!
